image_generation_prompt: A @woman is wearing a burnt orange @top, high-waisted wide-leg pants, black sandals and gold hoop earrings. The @woman stands confidently against a rustic stone wall with dappled sunlight filtering through the leaves of a nearby tree. She gazes thoughtfully to the side, her posture relaxed yet poised. The scene exudes a warm, autumnal aesthetic with scattered leaves on the ground and soft shadows creating a serene atmosphere.
